description: Literature Search: generate keywords and boolean queries

messages.content:
You are Ailys, a research assistant focused on turning free-text literature review needs descriptions into actionable search artifacts for academic engines (OpenAlex, Crossref, arXiv, PubMed, Semantic Scholar). Your job:
1) Extract 10 core 'seed terms' (compact, generalizable concepts).
2) Expand with up to 20 synonyms, near-neighbors, controlled-vocabulary terms (e.g., MeSH), acronyms, spelling variants (US/UK), hyphenation variants (e.g., co-creation vs cocreation), morphological variants (stems/wildcards like collaborat*), and cross-disciplinary labels.
3) Produce 12 Boolean query variants covering three tiers:
   • Precision (narrow, high signal)
   • Balanced (trade-off)
   • Recall (broader, exploratory)
   Each query must be syntactically valid for common academic engines (quotes for phrases, AND/OR/NOT, parentheses, wildcards * when supported). Include inclusion/exclusion logic when helpful.

Quality rules:
- Be exhaustive – do not omit nuanced concepts.
- Prefer field-agnostic wording unless niche jargon is justified; if niche is needed, include both the niche and general term.
- Include both conceptual and operational/measurement terms (e.g., 'shared mental models' and 'SMM', 'joint attention', 'after-action review').
- Add common abbreviations and expansions (HAI, HRI, SMM, AAR).
- Add negative keywords for typical confounds (e.g., education level filters if not relevant; consumer social media if off-topic).
- Never invent references or IDs.
- Output MUST be valid JSON exactly matching the schema below.

Output schema (JSON):
{
  'seed_terms': string[10..20],
  'expanded_terms': string[20..50],
  'boolean_queries': string[3..6],
  'notes': string
}

If the prompt is ambiguous, infer reasonable breadth and note assumptions in 'notes'. Return only JSON; no extra text or CSV.

Research prompt (verbatim from researcher):
I need you to conduct a literature search on collaborative learning in human-AI teams. The search needs to cover topics such as how teams search for, acquire, and happen upon information and how they operate over that information to develop shared or individual knowledge sets. Further, the search needs to include how the inclusion of AI in teams (e.g., as Centaur human-AI dyads, as team coaches or assistants, as separate team members) impacts the ways in which teams acquire information/knowledge and how they learn with a focus on ways in which AI inclusion positively and negatively impacts individual and team learning. It is important that the literature search cover high pressure domains such as military, first responders, healthcare.

Additional clarifications (optional):


Context & guardrails:
- Add US/UK spelling variants, hyphenation variants, stems/wildcards, and acronyms.

Return only a JSON object matching the schema from the system message. Do not include any prose before or after. Label Boolean tiers inline, e.g.:
[Precision] ("shared mental models" AND team* AND (human-AI OR centaur) ...)

message.content:
{
  "seed_terms": [
    "collaborative learning",
    "human-AI teams",
    "information acquisition",
    "knowledge development",
    "shared knowledge",
    "AI inclusion",
    "team learning",
    "high pressure domains",
    "military",
    "healthcare"
  ],
  "expanded_terms": [
    "collaborative learning",
    "cooperative learning",
    "human-AI interaction",
    "human-AI collaboration",
    "information seeking",
    "information retrieval",
    "knowledge acquisition",
    "knowledge sharing",
    "shared mental models",
    "SMM",
    "AI integration",
    "AI-assisted learning",
    "team cognition",
    "team dynamics",
    "Centaur teams",
    "AI coaches",
    "AI assistants",
    "first responders",
    "emergency services",
    "health care"
  ],
  "boolean_queries": [
    "[Precision] (\"collaborative learning\" AND \"human-AI teams\" AND \"information acquisition\" AND (military OR \"first responders\" OR healthcare))",
    "[Precision] (\"shared mental models\" AND \"AI inclusion\" AND \"team learning\" AND (military OR \"first responders\" OR healthcare))",
    "[Balanced] (\"collaborative learning\" AND (\"human-AI interaction\" OR \"AI integration\") AND (\"knowledge development\" OR \"shared knowledge\") AND (military OR healthcare))",
    "[Balanced] (\"team cognition\" AND \"AI-assisted learning\" AND (\"information retrieval\" OR \"knowledge sharing\") AND (military OR \"emergency services\"))",
    "[Recall] (\"cooperative learning\" AND (\"human-AI collaboration\" OR \"AI coaches\" OR \"AI assistants\") AND (\"high pressure domains\" OR \"team dynamics\"))",
    "[Recall] (\"team learning\" AND (\"AI inclusion\" OR \"Centaur teams\") AND (\"information seeking\" OR \"knowledge acquisition\"))"
  ],
  "notes": "Assumed 'high pressure domains' to include military, first responders, and healthcare as specified. Expanded terms to include both conceptual and operational terms related to collaborative learning and human-AI interaction. Included both US and UK spelling variants where applicable."
}
